headline.main: BRITISH DESCRIBE INDUSTRIAL UNITY; Mission of Labor and Management Are Guests of OPM

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 18 -- A joint management-labor mission from Great Britain had luncheon today with officials of the Office of Production Management and told reporters later that the British people now believe that Germany will not be able to conquer Russia and are anxious to do their bit to relieve pressure on the Russians.
abstract: labor-management unity described by group in U S
